artist: Etcher: Richard Earlom; Artist: Andrea Sacchi; Printer: John Boydell
description: two men; one man in foreground on back on ground; second man semi--reclining leaning on PR hand; left arm to forehead; tree at right; above tree on rocks, a man and two figures overlooking scene; man with PR arm extended and index finger pointing
inscription:
Inscription

in plate below image in black: [THE DEATH OF ABEL./ From the Original Picture Painted by Andres Sacchi in the Collection of Mr. Reynolds./ Vol II no.10, size of the picture 12 .?. by 15 1/2 in Length. John Boydell exeudt. 1766]
title: The Death of Abel
